mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detection_event ( brand_id, patent_id, image_similarity, text_similarity, risk_level ) VALUES ( #{brandId}, #{patentId}, #{imageSimilarity}, #{textSimilarity}, #{riskLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT 1 - (bl.image_vector <-> p.image_vector) AS similarity FROM brand_logo bl JOIN patent p ON p.patent_id = #{patentId} WHERE bl.brand_id = #{brandId} ORDER BY bl.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
